name: Andra
Description: Dishes served in Andra style and include spice.Andra Chilly Chicken,Chicken Fry are the common dishes served here.

name: Arab
Description: Arab cuisine is defined as various regional cuisines spanning the Arab world, from the Maghreb to the Fertile Crescent and the Arabian Peninsula

name: Bengali
Description: Maacher Jhol is where the gravy of the dish is made with ginger, turmeric, cumin powder, green chillis.Shorshe maach fish is a very popular dish.

name: Chinese
Description: Modern "Eight Cuisines" of China are Anhui, Cantonese, Fujian, Hunan, Jiangsu, Shandong, Sichuan, and Zhejiang cuisines.

name: French
Description: Consist of authenthic food like Chicken Basquaise ,Steak Diane, Cinnamon Apple Bostock etc

name: Italian American
Description: Vegetable dishes. Eggplant parmesan or melanzane alla parmigiana is a common Italian dish. It typically includes sliced eggplant, marinara sauce.

name: Japanese
Description: The traditional cuisine of Japan (和食 washoku) is based on rice with miso soup and other dishes; there is an emphasis on seasonal ingredients

name: Keralite
Description: Offers a multitude of both vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes prepared using fish, poultry and red meat with rice a typical accompaniment.

name: Mughal
Description: It represents a combination of the cooking style and recipes of Central Asia and North India like Biryani,Paratha,Korma etc.
